moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.description4: This quest doesn't ask for coils, hatches or buses: feel free to choose whatever combination you want. You'll need &a8 coil blocks&r, &a1 input bus&r, &a1 output bus&r, and &21 maintenance hatch&r, &21 muffler hatch&r, and at least &a1 energy hatch&r, all of any tier.
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.description5: &2マルチスメルターは、GUIのロボットアームボタンを押すことで、電気炉と合金精錬炉のレシピを切り替えられます。&r そのため、最終的には少なくとも2台は必要になるでしょう。他のマルチブロックでもこの仕組みが採用されています。
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.title: &9Multi Smelter
moni.quest.2C6BEB5BBE5A91DC.description1: &2MV組立機を使用すると、次の回路層に必要ないくつかのパーツを組み立てることができます。
moni.quest.2C6BEB5BBE5A91DC.title: &2発展型組立機
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.description1: &2High-Octane Gasoline is a even more powerful combustion fuel, generating 3200 EU per mB of fuel. It can also be used in Cryolobus production, using 75% less fuel than Cetane-Boosted Diesel or normal Gasoline. The trade-off is the very complex processing lines you must set up for it.
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.description2: To refine Gasoline to High-Octane Gasoline, you will need:
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.description8: To get the most out of this, run it in an Extreme Combustion Engine with Liquid Oxygen.
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.title: &2High-Octane Gasoline
moni.quest.2D0DF78F71760F00.description1: Some Micro Miner missions use a &6Gemstone Sensor&r to scout out gems instead of ores.
moni.quest.2D0DF78F71760F00.title: &9Gemstone Sensors
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description1: The &3Fusion Reactor&r is a multiblock that uses enormous amounts of energy to fuse fluids into new elements. This one is less flexible than the previous GregTech multiblocks, as you can only put hatches where the preview shows. &6Sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description2: The &bEMI&r preview shows &eall valid hatch locations&r, but you don't actually need that many fluid hatches. You can replace any of the hatch positions in the structure with &2Fusion Machine Casings&r as long as you have at least &atwo Fluid Input Hatches&r and &aone Fluid Output Hatch&r. It's possible to use input/output hatches in every valid location, if you prefer.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description3: Because of this, the quest only asks for &248 Fusion Machine Casings&r. If you want to use the minimum number of fluid hatches, you'll need to craft an additional &229 Fusion Machine Casings&r. In addition to the &a48 Fusion Machine Casings&r, you will also need &631 Fusion Glass&r or &631 Fusion Machine Casings&r. &bFusion Glass is cheaper, and looks cooler&r, but it's your choice.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description4: Each &aEnergy Hatch&r increases the reactor's power buffer. &cYou cannot use 4x or 16x Energy Hatches in Fusion Reactors. &aAll 16 Energy Hatches&r are required to be able to process all Mark 1 recipes and give a power buffer of &e160M EU&r. &2However, not all energy hatches need to be connected to power. For example, a recipe that requires LuV power draw would only need one or more hatches connected to power, but a recipe that needs ZPM power draw would need at least two hatches connected to power.&r &cThey still need to be present on the structure!&r
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description5: In addition to the recipe power drain, Fusion Reactors have a &eheat&r mechanic related to the recipe's &e"EU To Start"&r. This amount of power is drained from the reactor's buffer before starting the recipe to heat up the reactor to the necessary temperature, and is independent of the recipe's EU/t cost. As such, this determines the minimum tier of reactor you need for a recipe.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description6: 核融合炉が処理を停止すると、ソフトマレットで一時停止したとしても、すぐに熱を失います。一方、核融合炉がすでにレシピに必要な温度に達している場合は、核融合炉を加熱するために追加の電力は必要ありません。これは、異なるレシピを切り替えた場合でも当てはまります。この仕組みにより、核融合炉の継続的な使用が促進されます。
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description7: If you switch to a recipe that requires more heat, &eonly the difference&r in heat values is consumed as EU to reach the target heat (up to a maximum heat equal to the reactor's current buffer).
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description8: Fusion Reactors &2overclock, but only once per fusion tier, instead of based on energy input.&r They gate the next tier of materials, so you will eventually want to make more than one.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.subtitle: Time to get fusing!
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.title: &2Fusion Reactor MK I
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description1: Now that you have everything you need to power your machines, it's time to put it all together.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description2: Your Steam Dynamo needs burnable fuel (like &6Coal&r) and &9water&r. It will output RF power through the Excitation Coil (the red bit at the top). The orientation of the Steam Dynamo can be adjusted with a &aCrescent Hammer&r if needed.

Your &6Steam Turbine&r needs &9Steam&r from your boilers. It will output EU power through the side with the dot. The orientation can be adjusted by &8Shift-Right-Clicking&r with a &aWrench&r, if needed.

Your Steam Dynamo needs burnable fuel (like &6Coal&r) and &9water&r. It will output RF power through the Excitation Coil (the red bit at the top). The orientation of the Steam Dynamo can be adjusted with a &aCrescent Hammer&r, if needed.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description3: &6エネルギーカード&rを使用してRF電力を伝送できますが、ダイナモは励磁コイルを変換機に接触させることで、RF電力を変換機に直接出力することもできます。あるいは、&eGT蒸気タービン&rを使用して電力を供給すれば、コンバーターを介さずに電力を供給することも可能です。
Now all you need are some &bGregTech&r machines to power up! You can make whatever you want, but its recommended that you get these two first:
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description4: The Energy Converter transforms RF power into EU, outputting the resulting EU through the side with a red dot. The orientation can be adjusted using a &aWrench&r. Attach your &6Conductive Iron Wires&r to the output side of the Energy Converter.
The &6Wiremill&r will make crafting wires much, much easier.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description5: Now all you need are some &bGregTech&r machines to power up! You can make whatever you want, but its recommended that you get these two first:
The &2Bender&r will make Plates from one ingot instead of two.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description6: The &6Wiremill&r will make crafting wires much, much easier.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description7: The &2Bender&r will make Plates from one ingot instead of two.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.title: Putting it all Together
moni.quest.2D47BFA44BDB5E6A.description2: &9This Micro Miner also brings back Dragon Eggs and Ender Dragon Scales, as well as Neutronium, depending on the mission&r.
moni.quest.2D47BFA44BDB5E6A.title: &9Tier Eight Micro Miner
moni.quest.2D5677EA9F47AA83.description1: A &9Multidimentional CPU Wafer&r needs to be enhanced and cut before it is usable in circuit recipes.
moni.quest.2D5677EA9F47AA83.description2: It may be worth setting up a line for these. They'll be seeing frequent use from here on out.
moni.quest.2D5677EA9F47AA83.subtitle: Technically, all CPU Chips are multidimensional.
moni.quest.2D788BE1CA9A2D69.title: Nothing
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50BCB988.description1: The &9Stablized Microminers&r are a major milestone! These allow for you to reuse microminers, allowing you to refactor your base a bit.
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50BCB988.title: &9Stablized Microminers
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description1: Note: this quest accepts LV/MV/HV/EV &3Gas Collectors&r.
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description2: A &3Gas Collector&r will suck up air at a decent rate, provided the top side is unobstructed. The collected Air is automatically ejected into an adjacent tank via the output face.
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description3: &2Gas Collectors in the Nether and End will collect Nether Air and Ender Air respectively, which yield different products. Make sure you set the correct circuit configuration for the dimension you are in.&r
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description4: IV+ air collectors are not part of this quest, but for reference they exist and are called &3Atmosphere Collectors&r.
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.title: &2Basic Air Collection
moni.quest.2DD1E2391DA3170C.description1: &6ナノ スーパーコンピュータ&r にアップグレードするには、いくつかの標準回路素材と &6ルミウムワイヤー&r が必要です。
moni.quest.2DD1E2391DA3170C.title: The Second Tier Five Circuits
moni.quest.2DDD4B4EC8065980.description2: &2Higher tier GT Batteries have been buffed to be quite strong - this one holds 25 MEU, or 100 MRF. You may want to consider using them over RF storage.
moni.quest.2DDD4B4EC8065980.title: &2EV Power Storage
moni.quest.2E079747A46D48CF.description1: This handy terminal allows you to see the pattern slots of all &aME Pattern Providers&r in your network in one place.
moni.quest.2E079747A46D48CF.description2: This means you don't have to run to your ME Pattern Providers each time you make a new pattern for them.
moni.quest.2E079747A46D48CF.title: Pattern Access Terminal
moni.quest.2E6BA621B265C3A8.description1: By baking a &2Raw Crystal Chip &rand &6Emerald&r or &6Olivine Plates&r with &9Helium&r in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r, you can create an &6Engraved Crystal Chip&r.
moni.quest.2E6BA621B265C3A8.description2: This is a material needed for &6Crystal Circuits&r.
moni.quest.2E6BA621B265C3A8.title: &2Engraved Crystal Chip
moni.quest.2E87146C82EF941C.description1: &2Tritanium Coils are the eighth coil material. At 10800K, it's capable of smelting nearly every material.
moni.quest.2E87146C82EF941C.title: &2Tritanium Coils
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description1: &c&r&9Monifactory&fの鉱石は大きな塊、&e鉱脈&fとして存在します。これらの鉱脈は世界中に点在しており、比較的よく見られます。&2発展型電動探知機(HV)を使用すると、7x7のチャンクエリア内で見つかる鉱石の種類を確認できます。&9鉱脈をクリックしてマップ上にマークすることもできます。
&c&rOres in &9Monifactory&f exist in large clusters, or '&eveins&f'. These veins are scattered around the world, and are relatively common.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description2: In order to proceed, you'll need to locate a source of &6Iron&f. You have a few options. &6Magnetite&f veins are higher up and contain large amounts of iron, as well as some &6Vanadium&f and &6Gold&f. Another good source of iron is &9Goethite&f veins, which contain several types of iron. Finally, &6Pyrite&f can be found paired with &6Copper&f in several types of veins.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description3: While the Prospector requires energy to work, you are unlikely to deplete its battery. That said, the quest book will later guide you towards making &2an HV Battery&r to charge &aHV tools &rin your inventory.

While the Scanner requires energy to work, you are unlikely to deplete its battery. That said, the quest book will later guide you towards making &2an HV Battery&r to charge &aHV tools &rin your inventory.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description4: 先に進むには、&6鉄&fの鉱脈を見つける必要があります。いくつかの選択肢があります。&6磁鉄鉱&fの鉱脈はより高所にあり、大量の鉄に加え、少量の&6バナジウム&fと&6金&fを含んでいます。鉄のもう一つの良い供給源は&6赤鉄鉱&fの鉱脈で、複数の種類の鉄を含んでいます。&6黄鉄鉱&fは複数の鉱脈で&6銅&fと共生しています。
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description5: &6Wrought Iron&f is obtained simply by &esmelting Iron a second time&f. It has more durability than Iron, so it is better for making tools, but &cdo not convert your entire Iron supply over to Wrought Iron&f. The two materials are not interchangeable and you'll need Iron or Wrought Iron as demanded by various recipes.

&6Wrought Iron&f is obtained simply by &esmelting Iron Nuggets a second time&f. It has more durability than Iron, so it is better for making tools, but &cdo not convert your entire Iron supply over to Wrought Iron&f. The two materials are not interchangeable and you'll need Iron or Wrought Iron as demanded by various recipes.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.subtitle: ULVの始まり
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.title: 鉄分供給
moni.quest.2EBB9A154522348F.description2: おめでとうございます。
moni.quest.2EBB9A154522348F.description3: &9Monifactory&rを楽しんでいただけたなら幸いです。
moni.quest.2EBB9A154522348F.subtitle: 勝者は君だ
moni.quest.2EBB9A154522348F.title: &9&lクリエイティブクアンタムチェスト&r
moni.quest.2EC4EF1BEEA578F3.subtitle: unlocks hm only quests
moni.quest.2EC4EF1BEEA578F3.title: &eHard Mode
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.description1: &2You only need this step if you are using normal Chemical Reactors. If you are using LCRs, the Allyl Chloride step is skipped.
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.description2: &9Allyl Chloride&r provides an alternative means of producing &9Epichlorohydrin&r for &9Epoxy&r.
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.description3: Reacting &9Chlorine&r and &9Propene&r will produce Allyl Chloride. Propene is distilled in a &3Distillation Tower&r from any one of various cracked petroleum products like &9Steam-Cracked Naphtha&r.
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.title: Allyl Chloride
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description1: &2Fluid Rigs will harvest fluids from underground fluid veins. Note that the fluid veins are simply simulated and don't exist in the world. &r
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description2: Shift-right-click while holding the &3Prospector's Scanner&r to set it to fluid mode, then right click it in order to see the type and amount of fluid underground and to check the depletion state of the vein. The first number represents the base amount of fluid extracted per second. You can also check the &eFluid Vein Information EMI&r page for information on where they spawn.
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description3: &eオーバーワールド&rでは、&9石油、軽油、重油、原油、天然ガス&rを採取できます。
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description4: 海洋バイオームでは、&6塩水&rも採取できます。
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description8: As Fluid Rigs work, they will deplete the vein under them, reducing their yields. When a vein is depleted, it still yields a small amount of its fluid. The first tier of Fluid Rig takes &9100,000 operations&r to deplete a vein. Higher tier Fluid Rigs harvest fluids far faster and deplete veins slower.
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.title: &2Fluid Rig
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description1: &9Sterilized Growth Medium&r is needed for &6Wetware Circuits&r.
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description2: You'll need to mix &6Mincemeat&r, &2Calcium, Salt, Agar, and Mutagen&r in a mixer to make &9Raw Growth Medium&r, then use a &3Fluid Heater&r to sterilize it. &2This is a significantly more involved process than before.&r
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description3: ミンチ肉はあらゆる種類の動物の肉を粉砕して作られます。この作業の自動化には&bThermal&rの&6水資源投網機&rが有効でしょう。
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description4: あるいは、&6腐った肉&rを精製して、そこから有用な製品を取り出すこともできるかもしれません。
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description5: &2Agar is produced from Mincemeat through multiple steps.
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.title: &2Sterilized Growth Medium
moni.quest.2FA9404468E4BBD9.description1: The &6Battery Buffer&r is a machine which can hold &6Batteries&r for energy storage. Each Battery accepts up to 2 amps and outputs up to 1 amp.
moni.quest.2FA9404468E4BBD9.title: Charging Batteries
moni.quest.2FD1AE24CD8BEBEB.description1: &2You can start to churn out Microprocessors&r. These are the best kind of Tier One circuits you can make, and you won't unlock the better recipes for them until &5EV&r.
moni.quest.2FD1AE24CD8BEBEB.description2: You should absolutely automate the production of these circuits, and &ekeep a stockpile automatically crafted&r so you don't have to wait around for them or bloat your crafting orders making them on-demand through AE.
moni.quest.2FD1AE24CD8BEBEB.title: &23番目で最後のTier 1回路
moni.quest.2FFEE746B0ECA2D8.description1: &6Sodium Hydroxide&r is a strong base, and an ingredient in &9Bio Diesel&r, among other reactions.
moni.quest.2FFEE746B0ECA2D8.description2: &2The only source&r is splitting &9Salt Water&r in an &3Electrolyzer&r - this is also a good source of &9Chlorine&r. You can get &9Salt Water&r from mixing &6Salt&r and &9Water&r (duh), &2dissolving Ghast Tears, or drilling it from Salt Water fluid veins, which only spawn over oceans.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description1: &3Vacuum Freezers&r are primarily used to cool down hot ingots.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description2: They're also capable of freezing air into a liquid, and making superconductors.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description3: At minimum you will need an energy input hatch, an input bus, an output bus, a maintenance hatch, and 21 &6Frost Proof Machine Casings&r for forming the multiblock for processing Hot Ingots.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description4: If you want to deal with fluids as well, subtract two casings and use a fluid input and fluid output in their place.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description5: Besides the controller placement, as usual the hatches/buses can go anywhere. Use the building guide in &bEMI&r which can be pulled up from the controller block.
moni.quest.30EBD4E7BBFFEF2C.description1: &6Pulsating Dust&r is a mysterious magical material that taps into the power of Ender. It has all sorts of strange (and potentially dangerous) applications, including the ability to make &6Pulsating Iron&r and &6Ender Pearls&r.
moni.quest.30EBD4E7BBFFEF2C.description2: Your first source of Pulsating Dust is &6Uraninite&r, which you can get from &6Uraninite Ore&r. Later on, you'll be able to produce Pulsating Dust by smelting &6Resonant Clathrates&r.
moni.quest.30EBD4E7BBFFEF2C.title: Pulsating Dust
moni.quest.3115EAF1F70A613E.description1: カンタルは鉄、アルミニウム、クロムの合金です。
moni.quest.3115EAF1F70A613E.description2: This alloy is cooked in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r into a &6Kanthal Ingot&r.
moni.quest.3115EAF1F70A613E.title: Kanthal Ingots
moni.quest.31A4355401B03644.description1: If somehow being able to store over a million items in a single &9256k Item Storage Cell&r isn't enough for you, there are now &9MEGA Cells&r!
moni.quest.31A4355401B03644.description2: &eMEGA Cells&r go up to 256M bytes, allowing them to store an insane amount of items. You will need high-end materials to make the housings for these cells.
moni.quest.31A4355401B03644.title: &9MEGA Cells
moni.quest.3270496124969A51.title: &9Backpack
moni.quest.3D6BC54DBE665638.description1: Holding one of these reveals &aTravel Anchors&r in range.
moni.quest.3D6BC54DBE665638.description2: 狙いを定めて右クリックするとその場所にワープします。または、任意の場所をポイントして Shift キーを押しながら右クリックすると、短い距離を前方にテレポートします (壁を通り抜けても機能します)。
moni.quest.3D6BC54DBE665638.description3: These are powered with RF, and can be further enchanted through &bEnder IO&r's enchanting mechanics.
moni.quest.33131617D0919A5B.title: 元素番号049番:インジウム
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.description1: If your server admin allows it, you can use JourneyMap to create and teleport to waypoints you set. You can access JourneyMap waypoints by hitting the N key by default. Use this feature to gather resources quickly.
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.description2: If JourneyMap teleportation is disabled, you can still use the &e/sethome&r command to register where your house is, and &e/home&r to return to it. If you supply a name (default "home") then you can register and go to multiple locations. There is a limit on the number of homes you can set, though.
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.description3: Later on you'll discover other means of teleportation.
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.subtitle: Make returning home easy!
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.title: JourneyMap and Registering Homes
moni.quest.33351123F08D92BE.description1: Smelt your &6Sand&r into &6Glass&r. If you're using a &3Electric Furnace&r to smelt it, it's more efficient to use the upgraded &3Furnaces&r, such as &3Iron Furnaces&r, which you can fuel with &6Sugar Cane&r. However, using an &3Arc Furnace&r doubles your glass output. Later, once you unlock them, &3Multi Smelters&r will be the best for this.
moni.quest.33351123F08D92BE.title: Glass
moni.quest.33714BC51815A665.description1: Combine your &6Dust&r and &6Lava&r into &6Netherrack&r. Pretty much used for nothing, apart from your first &6Hellish Matter&r and &6Netherrack Dust&r. No need to passive this.
moni.quest.3380CBA4E4010EEC.description1: Break up your &6Gravel&r into &6Sand&r. Pretty much just another step of the &eCobbleworks&r.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description1: &9Vinyl Chloride&r is an industrial chemical made from chlorinating &9Ethylene&r (adding &9Chlorine&r at high temperature) in a &3Chemical Reactor&r. &9Ethane&r can be used as an alternative reagent.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description2: It is used to create the plastic &9Polyvinyl Chloride&r, most well known as PVC. While it deviates from reality, in GregTech you chemically react Vinyl Chloride and &9Oxygen&r to polymerize it into PVC.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description3: Later, you can use &9Titanium Tetrachloride&r to catalyze this reaction as well for greater yield.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description4: You'll only need to solidify this into sheet form. If you want PVC pipes too, you can pulverise the sheet into dust and use that in the extruder, or you can solidify it into bars seperately.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description5: &6PVC Sheets&r are superior to &6Polyethylene Sheets&r for making plastic substrates, producing twice as many &6Plastic Boards&r per craft.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.title: Polyvinyl Chloride
moni.quest.33F610CF136278AE.description1: Taking a look at the &6Corrupted Universe Data&r has given you a couple of ideas, but to properly take advantage of it, a new Micro Miner is needed.
moni.quest.33F610CF136278AE.description2: This Micro Miner requires an Epic Extended Crafting Table to fit all the things required for a foray into a corrupted universe.
moni.quest.33F610CF136278AE.title: &9Tier Eleven Micro Miner
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.description1: A more advanced type of &6Silicon Boule&r, formed by doping the &6Silicon&r crystal lattice with &6Phosphorus&r.
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.description2: These are made in an &3EBF&r with &2Kanthal&r or better coils, and need &2Nitrogen&r for the process. It needs twice as much Silicon as the basic boules, but also results in twice as many doped Silicon Wafers when sliced.
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.description3: Circuit Wafers can be made far more efficiently with these doped Silicon Wafers, but they are also needed for some more advanced types of Circuit Wafers that can't be engraved onto the basic ones.
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.title: &2Phosphorus Doped Silicon Boule
moni.quest.34CA940B412284F2.description1: Your initial method of &9Steam&r production, to fuel your first machines. They automatically output Steam on all faces except the bottom.
Your initial method of &9Steam&r production, to fuel your first machines. They automatically output Steam on all faces except the bottom.
moni.quest.34CA940B412284F2.description2: Once you get Steel, consider investing in HP Solar Boilers.
Once you get Steel, consider investing in HP Solar Boilers.
moni.quest.358D9A7B1BCFA30A.description1: &6Carbon Fibers&r are useful for a variety of things.
moni.quest.358D9A7B1BCFA30A.description2: &2They are made with Carbon Dust and polymers. Higher tier polymers grant higher yields. It's also not a chanced output anymore.
moni.quest.358D9A7B1BCFA30A.title: &2Carbon Fibers
moni.quest.35D128D56DAFDFAA.description1: &2Use Uranium-238 (or more efficiently, Uranium-235) to enrich Bacterial Sludge, and distill it to Mutagen. You can also use Naquadria to double your Enriched Bacterial Sludge yield.
moni.quest.35D128D56DAFDFAA.description2: Mutagen is used in Growth Medium production.
moni.quest.35D128D56DAFDFAA.title: &2Mutagen
moni.quest.360B577684B1AB1B.description1: &2A System-on-Chip can be engraved with HV power and Phosphorus Boules. This unlocks the ultimate tier one circuit recipe in the EV Circuit Assembler.
moni.quest.360B577684B1AB1B.description2: The ultimate tier two circuit recipe requires an IV Circuit Assembler.
moni.quest.36100ACD3655DAFF.description1: &6Lava&r can be achieved in two main ways. The first is using a &3Chemical Reactor&r to turn &6Magma Blocks&r into &6Lava&r. The second is using a &bGregTech &6Fluid Drill&r in the Nether above a &6Lava&r vein.
moni.quest.3650EF39B5AB4A7D.description1: &2Phenolic Substrates need to be turned into Circuit Boards with Silver before being usable in Circuit production.
moni.quest.3650EF39B5AB4A7D.description2: &2Sodium Persulfate and Iron III Chloride are troublesome to get right now, but using them in making Circuit Boards will reduce the amount of Silver required by 4 times.
moni.quest.3650EF39B5AB4A7D.title: &2Good Circuit Boards
moni.quest.36902938AFF55303.title: 元素番号010番:ネオン
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description1: The &3Power Substation&r is GregTech's native mass power storage solution.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description2: The structure can accept up to 18 layers of 3x3 &aLapotronic Capacitor&r blocks. GT batteries can hold &96x&r the EU their item counterparts can hold when crafted into a &aLapotronic Capacitor&r. The structure need not be made of all of the same tier blocks, but it must be full, so fill any empty space with &aEmpty Capacitor Blocks&r.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description3: Insert power through &6Energy Hatches&r and extract from &6Dynamo Hatches&r, each of any tier. The Power Substation can accept special &664A Substation Hatches&r, as well as &aLaser Hatches&r.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description4: The Power Substation will &cpassively lose 1%&r of its total capacity every 24 (real-life) hours, up to 100,000 EU/t per capacitor block. This is equivalent to &95.8 billionths&r of its total capacity per tick, so this should not be a concern under regular operation.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.title: &2Power Substation
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description1: You may wish to &aautomatically sprint&r instead of having to press &eControl + W&r or &eW twice&r.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description2: To achieve this, change the &bSprint&r keybind to &eW&r. (or the same keybind as Walk Forward)
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description3: A &aGrappling Hook&r is also very useful in an urban environment, allowing you to climb buildings with ease!
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description4: There are lots of ways to upgrade and improve your &aGrappling Hook&r, so play around with it.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description5: Open your inventory and look for the &3Curios&r button, click it to reveal the additional curio slots, and put the hook in the hook-shaped slot.
Open your inventory and look for the &3Curios&r button, click it to reveal the additional curio slots and put the hook in the hook shaped slot.
Open your inventory and look for the &3Curios&r button, click it to reveal the additional curio slots and put the hook in the hook shaped slot.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description6: The default key to fire a hook is &6C&r, however if you want to change it, simply search for &5category:ReHooked&r in the key binds screen and change it to whatever you want.
The default key to fire a hook is &6C&r, however you might want to change it, simply search for &5category:ReHooked&r in the key binds screen and change them to whatever you want.
The default key to fire a hook is &6C&r, however you might want to change it, simply search for &5category:ReHooked&r in the key binds screen and change them to whatever you want.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.subtitle: &oFaster is better!
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.title: Movin' Around
moni.quest.374EB1BB1E2F6B9C.description1: &9Hydrogen&r and &9Nitrogen&r combine together to make &9Ammonia&r in an &6HV&r Chemical Reactor.
moni.quest.374EB1BB1E2F6B9C.description2: An easy way to get Nitrogen is to centrifuge &9Air&r, which will require you to build an &3Air Collector&r. You could also electrolyze &6Saltpeter&r, distill &9Fermented Biomass&r in a &3Distillation Tower&r, or get huge amounts from &2distlling Liquid Air in a Distillation Tower.&r.
moni.quest.374EB1BB1E2F6B9C.title: &2Ammonia
moni.quest.376EE785F4204FFE.description1: &2選別機は、洗浄した宝石鉱石から、傷のない宝石と精巧な宝石を採取します。全体的な収量が向上します。
moni.quest.376EE785F4204FFE.description2: &2You will need small quantities of Flawless Emeralds for MV Emitter and Sensor components.
moni.quest.376EE785F4204FFE.title: &2Sifter
moni.quest.3781AD70E71CA0D7.description1: &2An expensive advanced component used in the construction of the MV Precision Laser Engraver and MV Circuit Assembler.
moni.quest.3781AD70E71CA0D7.description2: Process some Emerald Ore in the Sifter to get the Flawless Emerald required to craft this.
moni.quest.3781AD70E71CA0D7.title: &2MV Emitter
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description1: The &3High Performance Computing Array (HPCA)&r is a computer which provides &dComputation Work&r to be used in the &3Research Station&r. The amount of &dComputation Work&r it provides depends on the type of HPCA parts within it. It also needs to receive adequate &dCooling&r provided by Coolers within its structure.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description2: Connect the &3Computation Data Transmission Hatch&r to the &3Reception Hatch&r on your &3Research Station&r to transfer the &dCWU/t&r produced to it.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description3: The HPCA accepts almost any combination of &3Computation Components&r, &3Coolers&r, &3Bridges&r and &3Empty Components&r within the 3x3 area behind the &aComputer Heat Vents&r. The suggested components will build a &d16 CWU/t&r HPCA, enough for scanning the &3Fusion Reactor Mk2&r, &6UV Circuits&r, and all &6ZPM Components&r. You can get away with less at first, but you will eventually need to upgrade to this computing power. Refer to &eEMI&r for some other possible setups.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description4: The &dCWU/t&r of the HPCA is determined by the sum of the outputs of the &3HPCA Computation Components&r within it. Regular &3Computation Components&r produce &d4 CWU/t&r each, and require &d2 Cooling&r each. &3Advanced Computation Components&r, which you do not have access to yet, produce &d16 CWU/t&r each and require &d4 Cooling&r each.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description5: &dCooling&r is provided by &3Cooler&r blocks within the structure. &3Passive Coolers&r provide &d1 Cooling&r each for free, whereas &3Active Coolers&r provide &d2 Cooling&r each with a steady flow of &9Dielectric PCB Coolant&r, provided through an &3Input Hatch&r. If the Cooling within the HPCA is insufficient, the components may be &cdamaged&r from overheating. The physical position of the components within the HPCA does not matter.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description6: A &3Bridge Component&r may be installed, allowing the HPCA to connect to &3Network Switches&r.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description7: The energy consumption of the HPCA is determined by the sum of its parts. 'Max Energy' refers to the power draw while the HPCA is computing, while 'Upkeep Energy' refers to the power draw when the HPCA is idling.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.title: &2High Performance Computing Array
moni.quest.37FD045CC0AEB11B.title: 元素番号???番:ナクアダ
moni.quest.383FADC5E8BC4E91.description1: You can turn &6Plant Balls&r and other various &6sugary crops&r into &9Biomass&r with a &3Brewery&r. Biomass is the first step towards making Plastic in the form of &9Polyethylene&r.
moni.quest.383FADC5E8BC4E91.description2: The Brewery is a &overy&r slow machine, but it requires almost no power. Building &2many Breweries&r is necessary to brew enough Biomass for plastics. &2An alternative and more resource efficient way of making biomass is with a Pyrolyse Oven, Water, and Bio Chaff.
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description1: &2Advanced SMD Components&r are new to CEu and are required for &6Crystal, Wetware, and Optical Circuits&r. They can also be substituted for the equivalent of 4 normal SMD components in Nano and Quantum circuits.
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description2: All of these components require &1IV&r power and liquid PBI.
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description3: Advanced SMD Transistor: Vanadium-Gallium Foil and Fine HSS-G Wire
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description4: Advanced SMD Resistor: Graphene Dust and Fine Platinum Wire
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.title: &2Advanced SMD Components
moni.quest.39394D5596FF8BC8.description1: Any of these items will suck nearby items into your inventory.
moni.quest.39394D5596FF8BC8.description2: The &6GregTech Magnet&r, &6Ender IO Electromagnet&r, and &6Thermal FluxoMagnet&r can all be placed in a &dCurio slot&r to save inventory space.
moni.quest.39394D5596FF8BC8.title: Magnet
moni.quest.39588577CDBFCAE4.title: 元素番号045番:ロジウム
moni.quest.3969150B59EA38A2.description1: &3Obsidian Furnaces&f are slightly faster than &3Diamond Furnaces&f, taking only &a20 ticks&r to smelt an items, and are also blastproof.
moni.quest.3969150B59EA38A2.title: Furnace v7.0
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.description1: &9Ender Air&r, collected from a &3Gas Collector&r, can be sent into the &3Vacuum Freezer&r to turn it into &9Liquid Ender Air&r.
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.description2: &9Liquid Ender Air&r can be sent into a &2Distillation Tower&r to break it down into its components.
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.description3: &2Liquid Air and Liquid Nether Air give different useful components too.
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.title: &2Distilling Liquid Ender Air
moni.quest.39A09DA3903C5564.description1: These Boules have a hefty cost up front, but a single one will last you quite a while, in addition to allowing the creation of new Chips.
moni.quest.39A09DA3903C5564.subtitle: The final Boule
moni.quest.39A09DA3903C5564.title: &9Universe Boules
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.description1: &6蒸気ダイナモ&rはゲーム序盤の&9電力&rの供給源となります。発電には&6水&rと&6石炭&rや&6サトウキビ&rなどの燃料が必要です。
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.description2: You'll need a small bit of &6Silver&f for this dynamo. If you haven't found a &6Galena vein&f yet (which is where Silver is), then consider "buying" some &6Silver Ore&r using &9Monicoins&r. You won't need a ton of silver and lead just yet, so it won't bankrupt you.
Keep in mind that &eDynamos only output power when burning through fuel, and only the block/cable attached directly to the coil will get provided with power&f.
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.description3: Keep in mind that &eDynamos only output power when burning through fuel, and only the block/cable attached directly to the coil will get provided with power&f.
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.subtitle: Your first major crafting project!
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.title: Steam Dynamo
moni.quest.39FD6F1076559156.description1: The first Mainframe you'll have to contend with.
moni.quest.39FD6F1076559156.description2: This is the first Tier Five circuit available, and consequently the most expensive to make. As always, invest in the next circuit theme to get to cheaper recipes as soon as possible.
moni.quest.39FD6F1076559156.title: &2The First Tier Five Circuit
moni.quest.3A26187DC3FAD6B1.description1: These can be configured to stock up to &99 item stacks (576 items)&r or &936 buckets (9 types, 4 buckets each)&r for passive autocrafting and to push into other inventories&r. Any item pushed into an &aME Interface&r is digitized and placed in your ME Network storage.
moni.quest.3A26187DC3FAD6B1.subtitle: &9I don't hold patterns!
moni.quest.3A26187DC3FAD6B1.title: Interface
moni.quest.3A3C9648BD56ED20.title: 元素番号086番:ラドン
moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.description1: Basic &aFlux Capacitors&r hold a whopping &9500 kRF&r of energy and are useful for keeping your &aRF-powered&r equipment and tools charged.
moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.description2: Put one into your newly crafted &9Charger&r to charge it. You can then put it in your inventory to charge your items with &aRF&r.
moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.description3: RF蓄電地は&bCurio&rに対応しているので、インベントリを開いてCurioのスロットメニューから、任意のスロットに挿入できます。
moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.title: &9Flux Capacitors
moni.quest.3A69EE21B3089929.description1: &2Optical Fiber Cables&r are used to transfer &eResearch Data&r&r between &3Data Banks&r and &3Assembly Lines&r, or &eComputation Data&r between &3High Performance Computation Arrays&r, &3Network Switches&r, and &3Research Stations&r.
moni.quest.3A69EE21B3089929.description2: Note that Optical connections are limited to one &aTransmission Hatch&r to one &aReception Hatch&r.
moni.quest.3A69EE21B3089929.title: &2Optical Fiber Cables
moni.quest.3A71D736AE5C17E2.description1: All this &9Phenol&r needed for MV circuits and all the &6Steel&r needed for everything else may be putting stress onto your coal supply, so it may be worth looking into building a &9Greenhouse&r, and converting &6Wood&r into &6Charcoal&r to help solve the issue.
moni.quest.3A71D736AE5C17E2.description2: Providing it with &6Fertilizer&r will significantly increase its output.
moni.quest.3A71D736AE5C17E2.title: &9Infiniter Wood
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description1: With your EBF running, start to create a supply of &6Aluminium Ingots&r. These are a crucial ingredient for MV machines, including &bApplied Energistics&r.
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description2: 電力供給が不安定な場合は、発電量を増やすことを検討しましょう。発電機を追加して、蒸気ボイラーやタービンに改造しましょう。発電機のアップグレードもお勧めです。GT発電機を増設することも可能です。
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description3: However, you're also about to reach MV. You're bound to discover a better power source than steam before long.
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description4: &2You can cut the smelting time of Aluminium and some other smelting processes by a third with Nitrogen gas. Higher-tier processes may take different gases.
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.title: &2Aluminium Ingots
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.description1: &b&lEMI&r is the list of all items that you see every time you open your inventory. It's the better(tm) recipe book that shows you all available items and recipes in the modpack. Note that &b&lEMI&r is based on &b&lJEI&r, and people tend to use the names interchangably.
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.description2: To see it in action, pull up a quest that requires an item of some sort and just click the item!
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.rich_descrip: If you want to know how to craft an item, just hover your mouse over it and press
One of the remarkable features of EMI is that it's also capable of helping you with recipes, covered more in
. EMI will list all available recipes.
If you instead want to know what recipes use an item, hover over it and press
Hover over an item and press
to bookmark it. To remove a bookmarked item from the list, press
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.subtitle: &eUSE EMI!!!&r
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.title: &9&lUse EMI! Use EMI! USE. EMI.
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.description1: &6タングステン&rは、&5EV&3電解槽&rと&2化学槽&r、および少なくとも&6ニクロムコイル&rを備えた&3工業用電気炉&rを必要とする材料です。
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.description2: It is only found from &6Tungstate Dust &2and &6Scheelite Dust&2, obtained from their respective ores.&r Tungstate is also obtainable in small quantities from centrifuging &6Endstone Dust&r.
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.description3: 重晶石とタングステン酸塩は、タングステン酸を作るために塩酸に浸す必要があり、その後タングステンの粉を得るために電気分解する必要があります。その後、タングステンインゴットを作るためにEBFで焼く必要があります。
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.title: &2タングステン
moni.quest.3B639F4061B00F1A.description1: Your first &6Tier Two Circuits&r will require three &6Tier One Circuits&r plus two &6Diodes&r.
moni.quest.3B639F4061B00F1A.description2: These are rather expensive... Always be on the lookout for a cheaper way to make your circuits - new sets of recipes become available each time you make a new tier of &2Circuit Assembler&r. Conveniently, this tier of Circuit unlocks one now!
moni.quest.3B639F4061B00F1A.title: &2The First Tier Two Circuits
moni.quest.3B8EFDA817243B9F.description1: Seperate your &6Glass Dust&r into &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r. Can be electrolyzed into useful resources.
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description1: &9Phosphoric Acid&r is a key component of &6Luminessence&r, which will be used extensively for such things as &6Nether Stars&r, &6Lumium Blend&r, and &bExtended Crafting&r components.
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description2: It can be made using several equally viable recipes:
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description3: &6Phosphorus&r, &9Oxygen&r, and &9Water&r can be chemically reacted to produce &9Phosphoric Acid&r (Requires the &3Large Chemical Reactor&r).
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description4: Alternatively, you can combine &6Phosphorus Pentoxide&r and Water for a much faster reaction.
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description5: Otherwise, you can react &6Apatite Dust&r, &9Sulfuric Acid&r, and Water to get Phosphoric Acid, &9Hydrochloric Acid&r, and a whole bunch of &6Gypsum Dust&r.
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.title: Phosphoric Acid
moni.quest.3BC7B5321B707F78.description1: Turn your &6Glass&r into &6Quartz&r. An &3Arc Furnace&r making &6Glass&r supports 2.5 &3Electrolyzers&r of the same tier. You will need a lot of &6Quartz&r, so it's crucial that you passive this.
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.description1: &6クリスタルCPU&r と &dLuV&3回路組立機&r を使用すると、IV回路の最終タイプである &6クリスタル処理装置&r を作成できます。
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.description2: &2This is the first Circuit which strictly requires Advanced SMD components. All of them will from now on.&r
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.description3: IV回路の最高峰であるこの回路は、自動化して備蓄しておくべきです。&6クリスタルSoC&rを必要とする派生レシピは、&3UV回路組立機&rが作成できるようになるまで利用できません。
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.title: &2The Fourth and Final Tier Five Circuits
moni.quest.3C3E015DFA8FDECE.description1: The &6Molecular Assembler&r is the most flexible way to autocraft recipes that would otherwise be done in the &3Crafting Table&r, &3Stonecutter&r, or &3Smithing Table&r.
moni.quest.3C3E015DFA8FDECE.description2: Place one next to a &6Pattern Provider&r with a compatible &6Pattern&r and it will perform those recipe types when requested, no further configuration required.
moni.quest.3C3E015DFA8FDECE.description3: It can also craft recipes passively if supplied with a compatible &6Pattern&r and &aAE&r power.
moni.quest.3D54068FFDD1F3CE.title: 元素番号004番:ベリリウム
moni.quest.3D7924B550A1BBA0.description1: 小型ポケット次元内に&6クリスタル 回路&rコンポーネントをパッケージ化すると、超次元計算をさらに推し進めることができ、&6超次元演算処理装置&rを作成できるようになります。
moni.quest.3D7924B550A1BBA0.title: &9三番目で最後のTier 9 回路
moni.quest.3D9E25B45A7942A7.title: 元素番号???番:トリタニウム
moni.quest.3DD8D9EEA7189186.description1: &6HSS-G&r is the fifth coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 5400K so it can process more advanced materials, such as &6Naquadah&r.
moni.quest.3DD8D9EEA7189186.title: HSS-G Coil Blocks
moni.quest.3E12862AD553EB8A.description1: Mixing &6Titanium&r with &6Mana Dust&r creates &6Mythril Dust&r. This can be smelted into ingots in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r equipped with &6Kanthal Coils&r or better.
moni.quest.3E12862AD553EB8A.description2: Mythril is the basis of &bThermal Expansion&r device casings, and is used for many advanced &aAugments&r.
moni.quest.3E42B4AAA6D2A05B.description1: 回路組立機に使用される高度な素材。
moni.quest.3E4DEA4FFD019AB9.title: &9Upgrades, people, upgrades.
moni.quest.3E51686E2DBD380F.description1: The place for your very first chemical reactions, namely making some improved substrates.
moni.quest.3E51686E2DBD380F.title: LV Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.description1: Now that you have a &3Wiremill&f and a &2Bender&f, you can consider starting to do &eBounties&f. The &6Bounty Board&f has a global inventory containing quests to turn in specific items in exchange for &9Monicoins&f. These quests have a fairly short duration, so make sure to &estockpile the items&f that come up on them or else they'll &cexpire before you can complete them&f.
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.description2: With renewable &9Monicoins&f, you should feel free to spend the ones you have on whatever you need. &aSpend your coins!
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.subtitle: Money!
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.title: &2Bounties For monicoins!
moni.quest.3E90A188715DA88A.description1: Combine your &6Quartz&r and &6Resonant Ender&r to make &6Resonant Clathrate&r. One &3Electrolyzer&r making &6Quartz&r supports 2.4 &3Chemical Reactors &rof the same tier.
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.description1: The &3Bender&r improves the yield of a great deal of items. Most notably, you can use it to get one &6Plate&r from a single ingot, instead of having to spend two ingots for a single plate.
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.description2: As with the &3Wiremill&r, this requires a &6Programmed Circuit&r to tell it what to make. For plates, this is &econfiguration 1&r. Refer to &eEMI&r for which configuration to use for your recipe.
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.description3: Other materials it can produce include:
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.title: &2Bender
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.description1: &6ニッケル&rは、&6硫鉄ニッケル鉱&rや&6珪ニッケル鉱&rなど、いくつかの異なる鉱石から生成されますが、それらはすべて同じ鉱脈で見つかります。
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.description2: ニッケルは主に、&6インバー&rや&6キュプロニッケル&rなどのいくつかの非常に重要な合金に使用されます。
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.subtitle: Copper... Nickel... Cupronickel?
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.title: Cupronickel and Invar
moni.quest.3F77EDE69BB649DA.description1: &3Silver Furnaces&f are another step up in speed, taking a mere &a80 ticks&f to smelt an item.
moni.quest.3F77EDE69BB649DA.title: Furnace v4.0
moni.quest.3FF918B4CF33E8F7.description1: &6バザルツシャード&rの粉。&3粉砕機&rを使用すると、収穫量が2倍になります。
moni.quest.3FFC053E3E11D586.description1: &9Darmstadtium&r is formed by fusing Arsenic and Ruthenium, and is the main material for UV machines.
moni.quest.3FFC053E3E11D586.title: &2Darmstadtium
moni.quest.400AD2B735FF135D.description2: Circuits are the baseline of the entire &9Monifactory&r progression, so keep climbing!
Circuits are the baseline of the entire Monifactory progression, so keep climbing!
Circuits are the baseline of the entire Monifactory progression, so keep climbing!
moni.quest.400AD2B735FF135D.rich_descrip: Click to go to the chapter
was added so you can keep track of the important bits of the pack.
moni.quest.400AD2B735FF135D.title: Progression Tab
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.description1: &aMolds&r are used in a &3Fluid Solidifier&r or &3Alloy Smelter&r to form materials into specific shapes. These are not consumed or damaged during crafting, so you can leave them in a machine to dedicate it to that shape.
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.description2: The Fluid Solidifier tends to be the more efficient option: for example, you can use &e8 ingots&r to make one &6Gear&r in an Alloy Smelter, but with an Extractor and Solidifier you can accomplish the same result with &e4 ingots&r.
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.description3: Be careful not to accidentally make &aExtruder Shapes&r. Those are for a machine you will get access to later. The three molds in this quest are ones you will find useful right away.
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.title: Molds
moni.quest.408C7F5C8340AF27.title: 元素番号058番:セリウム
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.description1: &2Your first few Raw Crystal Chips must be grown in an Autoclave from liquid Enderium, or more efficiently with Europium, and Exquisite Emeralds or Exquisite Olivine.
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.description2: After the first few, you can smash them into pieces using a Forge Hammer, and duplicate them with Bacterial Sludge, Mutagen, or more Europium or Enderium.
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.description3: Bacterial Sludge can later be obtained in the byproducts of getting Stem Cells.
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.title: Crystal Growing
moni.quest.4107A9B0CA139E6C.description1: Craft your &6Clay&r to make &6Clay Balls&r.&r You can also use &3Compacting Drawers&r.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description1: &6P2Pトンネル&r (&aPoint To Point Tunnels&r) は、&bApplied Energistics 2&r の強力なツールで、セル ストレージ スペースを必要とせずに、ME システムを使用してアイテム、レッドストーン、RF/EU、または流体をある場所から別の場所に送信するために使用できます。&cEU の輸送には、輸送されるアンペアのサイズと数に基づいて入力エネルギーに税がかかります。&r
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description2: Each P2P tunnel system may have only &cone input&r but &eany number of outputs&r. There is no limit on how many P2P tunnels, or P2P tunnel systems, you can have on one network.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description3: デフォルトでは、P2Pトンネルは&6MEトンネル&rと呼ばれ、Applied Energisticsのチャネルと電力を伝送します。チャネルは無効化されているため、デフォルトのトンネルをそれほど使用することはないでしょう。&bEMI&rに表示される各項目でトンネルを右クリックすることで、P2Pトンネルのモードを変更できます。
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description4: To configure your P2P tunnels, take a &6Memory Card&r. While holding the memory card, &ashift-right click&r the unconfigured tunnel, to set the frequency of the input, and save the frequency to the memory card. Once the first tunnel has been set up this way and the memory card is configured with the frequency, any subsequent tunnel you &aright-click&r with the memory card will be set as the output of the most recent frequency used.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description5: You can also use memory cards to copy the configuration of ME blocks and tile-entities, such as &6Interfaces&r and &6Storage Buses&r. &aShift-right click&r a ME block to copy its configuration, and &aright-click&r to paste that configuration. Note that this doesn't copy upgrades applied to the block.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description6: You can also &ashift-right click&r to empty the frequency, or the ME block configuration, set in the card.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.subtitle: Network Recursion
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.title: P2Pトンネルとメモリーカード
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description1: Fluix is initially made via in-world crafting, by dropping &6Redstone&r, &6Nether Quartz&r, and a &6Charged Certus Quartz Crystal&r in the same block of &9Water&r. You'll see some sparks then the items will merge into a &6Fluix Crystal&r. Be sure to turn off any nearby item magnets/collectors or they might interrupt this crafting process.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description2: The &3Energy Acceptor&r converts RF power into AE power that Applied Energistics uses, in a 2 RF to 1 AE ratio. This power will be transmitted through adjacent full-block ME Network devices, as well as along all connected &6ME Cables&r and &6Quartz Fibers&r.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description3: Quartz Fibers are &emicroparts&r you can put between an ME Cable and any ME Network block or another ME Cable. This will allow transmission of AE power but not data, which is useful for having data-isolated ME Networks all sharing the same power source.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description4: Applied Energistics 2 can be complicated for a new player, so it is recommended to either &l&3use the in-game guide&r &e(Press G while hovering over a compatible item)&r or a video as a supplement to this chapter if need be.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.rich_descrip: また、以下もご覧ください
. While written for the 1.12 verison of AE2, most of the infomation is the exact same between the versions.
moni.quest.4177C4BD329C38DA.description1: このラインに沿った回路は全てUIVの回路であり、レシピですべて置き換えることができます。
moni.quest.4177C4BD329C38DA.title: &9UIV Circuits
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.description1: &9Polyethylene (PE)&r is the most common category of plastic, made from polymers of &9Ethylene&r. Adding &9Oxygen&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r recreates (with some artistic license) early accidental synthesis of Polyethylene.
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.description2: When you have large amounts of &6Rutile&r and &6Bauxite&r (probably after you visit the Moon) you can consider using &9Titanium Tetrachloride&r as a catalyst to improve your Polyethylene yields. For now it's not a great idea, as in addition to its Overworld rarity, you need it for &6Titanium&r.
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.description3: Form &6Polyethylene Sheets&r using a &3Fluid Solidifier&r and a &aPlate Mold&r for use in crafting electronics components. You'll need both the liquid and the sheets. For &9Polyethylene (PE)&r pipes, you can either pulverise your sheets into dust and use those in the extruder, or solidify &9Polyethylene (PE)&r into &6Polyethylene Bars&r seperately.
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.title: Polyethylene
moni.quest.41B4EA53D6D7AE37.description1: Please note that all six variants of &6ME Terminals&r are &emicroparts&r, which means they need to be attached to an &6ME Cable&r to function.
moni.quest.41B4EA53D6D7AE37.subtitle: Access all of your items on a single screen. Soon, anyway.
moni.quest.41B4EA53D6D7AE37.title: Terminal
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.description1: &6蒸気破砕機&rは並列で 5.3 台の&7LV&3粉砕機&rとして機能します。&e蒸気搬入ハッチ&rを介して&91蒸気&rを入力する必要があります。
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.description2: これを使って、基本的な&e鉱石2倍ライン&rセットアップを構築することを検討してみてはいかがでしょうか。出力を、アップグレードした複数の&3かまど&rに接続しましょう。
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.description3: &4副産物は生成されません!&r 副産物を得るには、HV 粉砕機以上が必要です。
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.title: &9Steam Grinder
moni.quest.41C61F32DBEF85B7.title: 元素番号097番:バークリウム
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.description1: &2A heavy Naquadah isotope with more nuclear capability.
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.description2: &6濃縮ナクアダ&rは&3トリニウムコイル&r、一部の終盤の合金、および&6ナクアドリア&rとともに&6ナクアダ燃料棒&rの製造に少量使用されます。
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.description3: At least it's the easiest to obtain, and you can get it by the full Naquadah processing chain or by passing &6Purified Naquadah Dust&r through an &3Electromagnetic Separator&r.
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.title: &2Enriched Naquadah
moni.quest.424413BBCE3FD3BF.description1: An otherworldly material exclusive to Microverses, &6Naquadah&r is an important material in the late game.
moni.quest.424413BBCE3FD3BF.description2: It can be alloyed and enriched to various forms, and is the eventual source of &6Neutronium&r in a &3MK III Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.424413BBCE3FD3BF.title: Naquadah Ingots
moni.quest.425D1C34A82B054D.description1: The &3Naquadah Reactor&r is a structure used to generate considerable amounts of EU power from decaying &6Enriched Naquadah&r and &6Naquadria&r into &6Plutonium&r, &6Lead&r and other byproducts.
moni.quest.425D1C34A82B054D.description2: リアクターが実行できるレシピは 2 つあり、それぞれ出力と燃料効率のバランスが異なります。
moni.quest.425D1C34A82B054D.title: &9 Naquadah Reactor
moni.quest.4261BDA34D716EC8.description1:
&3オムニックシンセサイザー&r &6オムニウム&rを合成します。合成機は進行度が100に達すると&6オムニウムナゲット&rを1つ作成します。合成機でレシピを実行すると、そのレシピ以降に実行された他の固有のレシピの数に応じて、進行度が指数関数的に増加します。
&9参考までに、数十種類の異なる材料を使用すると、2種類だけを使用する場合よりも数百倍も多くの収穫量が得られます。&r
moni.quest.4261BDA34D716EC8.title: &9Subatomic Digital Assembler
moni.quest.42F1EF8432C05294.title: 元素番号028番:ニッケル
moni.quest.431BB650AC492C84.description1: &9Pressing the second tab in any given machine's GUI will open up a view showing the machine and any blocks it is touching.&r From there, you can click on a side of the machine and easily add, edit and remove &acovers&r, and configure if the machine should &3automatically output&r and which side it should output to.
moni.quest.431BB650AC492C84.title: &9 Machine Auto-Output
moni.quest.434142F777A2CCBE.description1: The last circuit board. These require UV circuits, &6Dimensional Circuit Boards&r, and &6Ultimate Gems&r, but at this point it shouldn't be an issue for you.
moni.quest.441E5CDAD5007906.description1: &6Rutile&r is a &6Titanium&r precursor found in &6Ilmenite Ore&r and &6Bauxite Ore&r, which spawn uncommonly in the End.
moni.quest.441E5CDAD5007906.description2: &6&r大量のイルメナイトとボーキサイトは月や他の惑星で見つけるか、&3マイクロマイナー&rから調達できます。
moni.quest.441E5CDAD5007906.title: Early Rutile
moni.quest.442C028AB73A0A06.title: 元素番号047番:銀
moni.quest.447E9501E57DA010.description1: &9Water&r can be achieved in many ways, but the most notable are: &6Water Collectors&r, which are very slow but cheap; &bThermal &6Aqueous Accumulators&r, which are a bit more expensive but way faster; and &bGregTech &6Infinite Water Covers&r, which are much more expensive, but save space because they're covers, and make water 16x faster than &6Accumulators&r.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description1: &oNote: This quest accepts any Super or Quantum Tank.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description2: &2Super and Quantum Tanks are the high-tier GT Fluid storage solution.&r
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description3: The first tier holds &68,000 buckets&r, and higher tiers hold more. They can also be used like Drums to put fluids in and out of machines.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description4: You can conveniently configure &cvoiding&r for them to always void, start voiding at 95% capacity, or never void.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description5: The item equivalent are &3Super Chests&r, which are used in certain &6Micro Miner&r recipes.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description6: Higher-tier versions of these are called &3Quantum Tanks&r and &3Quantum Chests&r. They all require their respective tier &3Hermetic Casings&r to craft.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.title: &2Super and Quantum Tanks
moni.quest.4489F567154BDB09.description1: Bits of a &6Blaze Rod&r. Using a &3Macerator&r doubles your yield.
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.description1: &2ダームスタチウム&rベースの機械筐体と&6ウェットウェア メインフレーム&rを整えれば、ついに UV &3回路組立機&rの作成に進むことができます。
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.description2: このレベルの組立機では、&6光学回路&rがアンロックされ、UVまでのクラフトレシピを扱えるようになります。また、オプションでZPM電力消費のレシピをオーバークロックすることもできますが、その場合、比較的多くの電力を消費することになりますが、速度が向上します。
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.description3: Alternatively, you can make an &6UV Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.title: &2UV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.description1: The &3Pyrolyse Oven&r can make more interesting products than just &9Phenol&r.
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.description2: &9Charcoal Byproducts&r breaks down into various wood products, such as &9Wood Tar&r, &9Wood Gas&r, and &9Wood Vinegar&r, each of which can be further broken down into various useful chemical compounds, such as &9Toluene&r, &9Methanol&r, etc.
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.description3: However, to take full advantage of decomposing these wood products, a &3Distillation Tower&r is required, so that all possible outputs can be obtained. You will need more &eDistillation Tower Slices&r than requested in the&r Distillation Tower quest, so be prepared to spend some more &6Stainless Steel&r.
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.title: Pyrolyse Products
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description1: Coming into &9Ludicrous Voltage&r, many new advanced materials will be required to craft items and components. Most of these materials require &6RTM Alloy Coils&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description2: &6Ruridit&r is an alloy of Ruthenium and Iridium. It is used in LuV components alongside &6HSS-S&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description3: &6Niobium-Titanium&r is the main LuV cable material. Later on, large quantities are required for &6Wetware Circuits&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description4: &6Vanadium-Gallium&r is the main ZPM cable material, but it is used now as an advanced conductive material for certain recipes.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description5: &6Osmiridium&r (not from the ore) is used to make the &6Ludicrous Voltage Coil&r, for LuV-tier energy I/O. It is later used to make ZPM components.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description6: &6Indium Tin Barium Titanium Cuprate&r is a LuV superconductor. Its uses are more limited, but it is used in places like the &3Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.title: &2Advanced LuV Materials
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.description1: &9Nether Air&r, collected from &3Gas Collectors&r, can be sent into the &3Vacuum Freezer&r to turn it into &9Liquid Nether Air&r.
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.description2: &9Liquid Nether Air&r can be sent into a &2Distillation Tower&r to break it down into its components.
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.description3: &2Liquid Air and Liquid Ender Air give different useful components too.
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.title: &2Distilling the Nether
moni.quest.45FA4FF0B16B3879.description1: The &6Steam Separator&r functions as 5.3 &7LV &3Centrifuges&r in parallel! It requires an input of &9Steam&r through a &eSteam Hatch&r, but it uses only some Steam.
moni.quest.45FA4FF0B16B3879.description2: While it can't process &9fluids&r, it's perfect for ore processing, letting you get the most out of your dusts and letting you not have to deal with washing your ores in a &3Cauldron&r.
moni.quest.45FA4FF0B16B3879.title: &9Steam Separator
moni.quest.4612D36D22AB4B34.description1: The first circuit to require complex SMDs.
moni.quest.4612D36D22AB4B34.title: &9The Fourth And Final Tier Eight Circuits
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.description1: &oThis is part of a Processing Line. Visit the Processing Lines tab to have more info, useful tips and a visual representation.&r
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.description2: Now that you have acquired &6Steel&r, your path to infinite cobblestone awaits! The &6Igneous Extruder&r continuously generates cobblestone for free.
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.description3: Later on, you could look into the &6Rock Crusher&r, which can do it faster at the cost of requiring power.
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.title: &9Infinite Cobblestone
moni.quest.4669C1DCEE4AA563.description1: &9一等級ロケット&r1基で月到達には十分です。また、ロケットを設置するための発射台が必要となります。
moni.quest.4669C1DCEE4AA563.description2: 設置中は、ロケットをシフト右クリックするとGUIが開き、燃料を供給したりロケットのインベントリにアクセスしたりできます。
moni.quest.4669C1DCEE4AA563.title: &9ロケット
moni.quest.4672EE66D51C32FF.description1: &9酸充填機&rは、宇宙服に酸素を充填するために使用され、宇宙空間の探査に活用できます。
moni.quest.4672EE66D51C32FF.description2: 月に基地を建設したいなら、&9酸素分配機&rと&9酸素センサー&rの導入を検討しましょう。さらに後には、重力そのものを制御できる&9重力制御機&rの作成も可能になります！
moni.quest.4672EE66D51C32FF.title: &9宇宙で呼吸する準備
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description1: &3Macerators&r are useful for grinding things down, replacing the &aMortars&r you've needed until now. This is an important machine you will be using for many things in the future.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description2: You don't really need an LV one, as you can use the superior &3Steam Grinder&r. LV or MV ones could be used for automation. However, HV ones provide chanced outputs, extremely important for &eOre Processing&r and other processes.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description3: One useful application for a Macerator in the near future is grinding down &6Clay&r or &6Terracotta&r into &6Clay Dust&f.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description4: Besides not having limited durability, a key advantage of Macerators over Mortars is the chance to get additional materials when grinding things down. These are called &ebyproducts&r, and HV or better Macerators will allow byproducts to appear.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description5: When reading Macerator recipes in &bEMI&r, you can tell which outputs are byproducts by seeing if &ethe tooltip tells you it has a chance to appear&r: guaranteed outputs do not list a chance. &2The chance increases by a certain amount for each tier of machine you have above the recipe's required tier. This chance is also listed in the tooltip.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description6: Macerators can now also recycle your old Machines for some extra materials.&r
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description7: Finally, a Macerator will only start processing if there is room for all possible outputs. Make sure you empty them so they can keep working.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.title: &2Macerator
moni.quest.46A56A5E3CC2403F.description1: An Insane Voltage tier &bGregTech&r battery. &2Equivalent to 400 Reinforced Redstone Flux Cells!
moni.quest.46A56A5E3CC2403F.title: &2IV Power Storage
moni.quest.46AF35D4EECA5BDB.description1: 水を生成するには、周囲に2つの&6水源ブロック&rが必要です。また、蓄水器から水を引き出す手段も必要です。例えば、&6LVポンプ&rを&aカバー&fとして使うなどです。
moni.quest.46AF35D4EECA5BDB.title: &9Infiniter Water
moni.quest.46C6F922B4ADCC8C.description1: Combining a &6Block of Mythril&r with some &6Stainless Steel Plates&r gets you a &6Machine Frame&r.
moni.quest.46C6F922B4ADCC8C.description2: These frames form the basis of &bThermal Expansion&r's more advanced machinery.
moni.quest.46C6F922B4ADCC8C.title: Thermal Machine Frame
moni.quest.47094A5717952699.description1: An &3Autoclave&r is a machine that uses liquids (usually water) to polish stones, carve gems into lenses, infuse gems with special liquids, and crystallize various dusts.
moni.quest.47094A5717952699.description2: You'll need an Autoclave for many recipes, but most presently you will need it to make &6Pulsating Crystals&r and &6Vibrant Crystals&r from &bEnderIO&r.
moni.quest.47094A5717952699.title: Autoclave
moni.quest.476F71CC0B0AC2A4.description1: &2Hydrofluoric Acid is a dangerous acid made by mixing Hydrogen and Fluorine. It is used in the production of Polytetrafluoroethylene, and in Uranium and Naquadah processing.
moni.quest.476F71CC0B0AC2A4.description2: Fluorine is best obtained from Topaz or Bastnasite Ore processing from their Micro Miner missions, and from processing renewable &9Deepslate.
moni.quest.476F71CC0B0AC2A4.title: &2Hydrofluoric Acid
moni.quest.47A81FADD828772D.description1: &6Pyrotheum Dust&r can be crafted from &6Blaze Powder&r, which you already have means of crafting. Use it to craft a &aThermal Elemental Model&r. The rest of the dusts can then be crafted from pristine matter.
moni.quest.47A81FADD828772D.subtitle: An alterative route
moni.quest.47A81FADD828772D.title: &9Neural Networking
moni.quest.47D092CBA484C0DE.description1: With your new &6Epoxy Circuit Boards, &6QBit CPUs&r, and some standard components, you can make the final type of Tier Four Circuit: the &6Quantum Circuit&r.
moni.quest.47D092CBA484C0DE.description2: As the best form of Tier Four circuit, these should be automated and stockpiled. The variant recipe requiring &6Advanced System-on-Chip&r won't be available until ZPM.
moni.quest.47D092CBA484C0DE.title: 3番目で最後のTier 4 回路
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.description1: It's a micropart, so you need to place it on an &6ME Cable&r.
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.description2: When encoding Processing Patterns, note the scrollbar on the left - you can encode up to 81 types of items and fluids!
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.subtitle: As the name suggests, this terminal lets you encode recipes onto &aBlank Patterns&r.
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.title: Pattern Encoding Terminal
moni.quest.483652BAEF59E125.description1: &6ハダルワープエンジン&rは&6Tier10以降のマイクロマイナー&rに必要な素材です。
moni.quest.483652BAEF59E125.title: &9Hadal Warp Engine
moni.quest.485CEA4199AAD352.description1: &2For making Wetware Circuits more easily. You need UV-tier power to make them that way.
moni.quest.485CEA4199AAD352.title: &2Highly Advanced SoCs
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description1: If you are distilling Ethanol, you now need an MV Distillery.
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description2: &rThe &3Distillery&r is a single-block machine which only outputs one distillate out of several and &cdiscards&r the rest. You can use this now to get &9Ethanol&r from &9Biomass&r, or to selectively distill &9Oil&r in multiple steps to &9Ethylene&r. Its advantage over the full Tower, apart from cost, is its &9energy efficiency&r. Therefore, it is recommended for fluids with only one useful output, like &9Biomass&r, &9Diluted Sulfuric Acid&r, and &9Diluted Hydrochloric Acid&r.
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description3: However, the Distillation Tower is recommended for advanced chemistry, as most things have more than one important output: &9Fermented Biomass&r, &9Charcoal Byproducts&r from your &3Pyrolyse Oven&r, and the entire line of petrochemicals from &9Oil&r, to name a few.
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description4: You're going to need it soon!
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.title: &2Distillery
moni.quest.4978EC7E56F89AB0.title: 元素番号054番:キセノン
moni.quest.49B872B193268554.description1: The first decent source of &6Dragon Eggs&r.
moni.quest.49B872B193268554.description6: Once you reach the &aHyperbolic Microverse Projector&r, this microminer can also get the following:
moni.quest.49B872B193268554.title: &2Tier Six Micro Miner
moni.quest.49C8716030809478.description1: The &3Crafting Core&r is used to convert special crystalline materials into empowered variants.
moni.quest.49C8716030809478.title: &9Empowerment
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.description1: &9Radon&r will be needed in large quantities.
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.description2: For now, you'll need to obtain it from Tier Two Micro Miner missions, in the form of &6Radon Salt&r. Electrolyze it for Radon and &6Rock Salt&r. &2You can also get it from distilling liquid Ender Air.&r
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.description3: Later, it will be possible to make Radon using a &bGregTech &3Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.title: &2Radon
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.description1: &2ナクアダ合金&r のマシン筐体と &6クリスタル処理メインフレーム&r を整えれば、ついにZPM&3回路組立機&rの作成に進むことができます。
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.description2: この電圧の回路組立機では、&6ウェットウェア回路&rがアンロックされ、ZPMまでのクラフトレシピを扱えるようになります。また、LuVの電力を消費するレシピをオーバークロックして、速度を向上させることもできます。
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.description3: Alternatively, you can make a &6ZPM Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.title: &2ZPM Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.4A56822201818607.description1: Crush your &6Cobblestone&r into &6Stone Dust&r. You'll actually get a lot of &6Stone Dust&r from &eOre Processing&r, but this could be your backup source. You'll need this for &6Concrete&r. You can also centrifuge this, although the resources gained are not very useful, and are in very small amounts.
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.description1: &bFunctional Storage&f provides a huge amount of storage for a single item type. Use them for things you have a lot of, such as stone, dirt and ores.
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.description2: &9Framing Template items can be used to easily decorate your drawers.&r
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.description3: Furthermore, you can do special stuff with your drawers, with &9Tools&r and &9Upgrades! Search &e@Functionalstorage&r in &bEMI&r to see them!
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.subtitle: &oThis quest completes with any drawer.
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.title: &9Drawers
moni.quest.4A6F916494B787AE.title: 元素番号001番:水素
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.description1: Well, you need patterns too I guess.
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.description2: The details of autocrafting will be explained in a later quest.
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.subtitle: Autocrafting at last.
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.title: Crafting Units
moni.quest.4AC51394FB5152E5.description1: The most advanced substrate available, prepared for bleeding-edge bioengineering technology.
moni.quest.4AC51394FB5152E5.description2: &6Wetware Circuit Boards&r are the basis of &6Wetware&r circuits.
moni.quest.4AF3060B2426B25F.title: 元素番号025番:マンガン
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description1: Steam Machines can run recipes listed as up to &d32 EU/t&r. They need to have their vent side unobstructed. Use a Wrench to change the venting side.
Steam Machines can run recipes listed as up to &d32 EU/t&r. They need to have their vent side unobstructed. Use a Wrench to change the venting side.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description2: - &3Forge Hammer&r: Allows you to make &62 plates&r from &63 ingots&r.
- &3Forge Hammer&r: Allows you to make &62 plates&r from &63 ingots&r.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description3: - &3Macerator&r: Allows you to grind &6Clay&r, and other ingots, into their respective &eDusts&r.
- &3Macerator&r: Allows you to grind &6Clay&r, and other ingots, into their respective &eDusts&r.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description4: - &3Compressor&r: Allows you to make &6Compressed Fireclay&r, and other materials.
- &3Compressor&r: Allows you to make &6Compressed Fireclay&r, and other materials.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description5: - &3Alloy Smelter&r: Allows you to make &6Bronze&r more efficiently, as well as other useful alloys like &6Invar&r. Also allows you to cast &6Glass&r, and make components like &eGears&r more easily, and make &6Rubber Sheets&r, with Molds.

- &3Alloy Smelter&r: Allows you to make &6Bronze&r more efficiently, as well as other useful alloys like &6Invar&r. Also allows you to cast &6Glass&r, and make components like &eGears&r more easily, and make &6Rubber Sheets&r, with Molds.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description6: You can upgrade them to HP version with Steel, which doubles their speed.
You can upgrade them to HP version with Steel, which doubles their speed.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description7: If the machine sounds start to get on your nerves, you can mute GT machines with a GT Hammer.
If the machine sounds start to get on your nerves, you can mute GT machines with a GT Hammer.
moni.quest.4B43ABA024E9A0B9.description1: &eGlass&r is extremely useful, and will be used for many things in the future. Currently, you need it for the &cSteam Extractor&r, and can use it for &6Solar Boilers&r.
&eGlass&r is extremely useful, and will be used for many things in the future. Currently, you need it for the &cSteam Extractor&r, and can use it for &6Solar Boilers&r.
moni.quest.4B43ABA024E9A0B9.description2: Currently, your only available method to make Glass is through &eGlass Dust&r. Combine &eQuartz Sand&r with a &eTiny Pile of Flint Dust&r in a &3Crafting Table&r. Then, alloy it with the &eBlock Mold&r you have crafted, and voila!

Currently, your only available method to make Glass is through &eGlass Dust&r. Combine &eQuartz Sand&r with a &eTiny Pile of Flint Dust&r in a &3Crafting Table&r. Then, alloy it with the &eBlock Mold&r you have crafted, and voila!
moni.quest.4B43ABA024E9A0B9.description3: Later, to save you from this suffering, you can make an &6Arc Furnace&r, which makes two Glass, from one Sand.
Later, to save you from this suffering, you can make an &6Arc Furnace&r, which makes two Glass, from one Sand.
moni.quest.4BBB1F5A2657650D.title: 元素番号029番:銅
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.description1: Crafting in a digital grid is heaven after using primitive wooden tables for so long.
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.description2: It's a micropart, so you need to place it on an &6ME Cable&r.
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.subtitle: Bye-bye Crafting Table
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.title: Crafting Terminal
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.description1: You'll be needing large quantities of the various Noble Gases so you should get this automated and running continuously.
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.description2: &2After liquefaction, Overworld Air grants Helium and Argon; Nether Air grants Helium-3 and Neon; Ender Air grants Helium, Krypton, Xenon, and Radon.
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.description3: Certain Noble Gases (as well as Nitrogen) can also boost the speed of EBF processes.
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.title: &2Noble Gases
moni.quest.4C76017864258EA9.description1: &2Gasoline is a powerful combustion fuel, generating 1600 EU per mB of fluid. It can also be substituted for Cetane-Boosted Diesel in Cryolobus production.
moni.quest.4C76017864258EA9.description8: To get the most out of this, run it in an Extreme Combustion Engine with Liquid Oxygen.
moni.quest.4C76017864258EA9.title: &2Gasoline
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.description1: As you continue to progress, crafting times for more advanced &3Electric Blast Furnace&r recipes will continue to increase. More advanced coils increase the operating temperature so you can smelt more advanced materials, &2and they also grant energy efficiency bonuses and speed bonuses to overclocking.&r
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.description2: Despite this, you'll still need to get your infrastructure for smelting, as well as power generation, up to par.
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.description3: You don't need to get all eight of these completed and running just yet, but plan to at some point in the future. Instead of upgrading existing EBFs, have them passively automating a stock of materials and build new EBFs with higher specifications for new materials.
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.title: &2Blast Furnaces Galore
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.description1: &6Cupronickel Coils&r form part of the structure of a few multiblocks. Presently, those are the &3Electric Blast Furnace&r and &3Pyrolyse Oven&r. Each tier of coil unlocks new recipes and provides various bonuses to the multiblock they are attached to.
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.description2: キュプロニッケルコイルは、&62倍キュプロニッケルワイヤー&r、&6ブロンズフォイル&r、および&6液体錫合金&rを使用して&3組立機&rで作成されます。
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.description3: For now, you need 16 coils for the &3Electric Blast Furnace&r and 16 for the &3Pyrolyse Oven&r. That totals to 176 Copper, 128 Nickel, 32 Tin, and 16 Iron.
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.title: &2Cupronickel Coils
moni.quest.4CE0D6E9E7DE3129.title: 元素番号096番:キュリウム
moni.quest.4D6AC14CAEEFC793.description1: Vanilla enchanting mechanics are just so tedious. Don't you wish you could just make a specific enchant instead of grinding levels and rolling the dice?
moni.quest.4D6AC14CAEEFC793.description3: The &3Dark Steel Enchanter&r is a device that uses &6Book and Quill&r, experience levels, lapis, and enchant-specific items to create an &6Enchanted Book&r with an enchantment of your choosing. Then you can just use an Anvil to enchant your item like usual.
moni.quest.4D6AC14CAEEFC793.description4: You can also make the &9Mending&r enchant which allows you to infinitely repair the item when damaged using &9Liquid XP&r in an &bEnder IO &aFluid Tank&r or &aPressurized Fluid Tank&r. Keep in mind that &9Mending&r does not work on &3Gregtech Tools&r.
moni.quest.4DB622A78605A2EB.description1: The first and most expensive Tier Six Circuit, needed for crafting the &3IV Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.4DB622A78605A2EB.description2: Requires a bunch of standard circuit components.
moni.quest.4DB622A78605A2EB.title: The First Tier Six Ciruits
moni.quest.4DC7B2BB86A2FEBD.title: 元素番号056番:バリウム
moni.quest.4DCB58F9B3771DC8.title: 元素番号002番:ヘリウム
moni.quest.4E39FDB6FACDF522.title: 元素番号044番:ルテニウム
moni.quest.4E4F03C44623A85D.description1: &3ヘリカル核融合炉&rは、元素を並列に融合できる大規模なマルチブロック構造です。&r。&9以前の核融合炉とは異なり、この核融合炉は同じレシピを継続的に実行しても効果がありません。&r
moni.quest.4E4F03C44623A85D.description2: For every Hatch it has, its buffer increases by 80M EU, and has a maximum of 1280M.
moni.quest.4E4F03C44623A85D.title: &9Helical Fusion Reactor
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.description1: &6タングステンスチール&rベースのマシン筐体と&6ナノプロセッサーメインフレーム&rが揃ったら、ついにIV電圧の&3回路組立機&rを作成できるようになります。
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.description2: このティアの回路組立機では、&6量子回路&rがをアンロックし、IV電圧までのレシピ作成が可能になります。また、EV電圧のレシピをオーバークロックすることも可能ですが、その場合、より多くの電力が必要のなります。
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.description3: Alternatively, you can make an &6IV Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.title: &2IV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.4E9530E62A4B673B.description1:
素材を精製して強力な&6液体ナクアダ燃料&rを生成できます。

&6ティア11マイクロマイナー&2ミッションを送るには少量の&6粗雑な液体ナクアダ燃料&2が必要になります。&r
moni.quest.4E9530E62A4B673B.title: &9Naquadah Fuel Refining
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.description1: Blasting your &9Dormant Infinity Compound Ingots&r and &cInfinity Catalysts&r together will give you &6Infinity Ingots&r, one of the strongest materials ever created.
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.description2: 虹彩コアをインフィニティインゴットに変換する代わりに、&6液化虚無&rに変換することもできます。完全な無の体現であるこの物質は、ケーブルコーティングシートとして最適です！そのため、すべての&aUEV&r以上のケーブルに必須となります。コアを加工すればするほど、得られる虚無の量が大幅に増加しますのでご注意ください。
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.subtitle: I bet we could make hulls out of this.
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.title: &9Infinity Ingots
moni.quest.4EAD8756BAAC6B2E.description1: If you don't want to mine Obsidian by hand, consider using a Fluid Solidifier to turn &cLava&r into &6Obsidian Blocks&r for you. The process is slow and energy intensive, though.
moni.quest.4EAD8756BAAC6B2E.description2: &3Fluid Solidifiers&r are useful for lots of other things too, of course. Look through the various molds to see what you can make with one.
moni.quest.4EAD8756BAAC6B2E.title: Fluid Solidifier
moni.quest.4EB9D1ADC4814330.description1: This is the first circuit that requires &6Polyethyl Cyanoacrylate&r, so go check that out.
moni.quest.4EB9D1ADC4814330.title: &9The Second Tier Nine Circuit
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description1: &2With advanced alloys from the Alloy Blast Smelter and IV Machines, you can make large versions of most GT machines.
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description2: &rThese are formed like multiblocks. You can add a &3Parallel Control Hatch&r in order to allow them to process &9more recipes&r at the same time. The highest tier of Parallel Control Hatch can facilitate processing &94096 recipes&r at once!
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description3: &9Crafting Co-Processers increase the rate that your ME network will "push" batches of items out, perfect for machines like these.&r
